name: Primordial Sea
short-desc: Creates heavy rain, which has all the properties of Rain Dance, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Fire moves to fail.
long-desc: When this Pokemon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes heavy rain.  Heavy rain has all the properties of  and also causes damaging Fire moves to fail.  Heavy rain ends when this Pokemon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of  and  and  will prevent the effects of heavy rain, including allowing Fire moves to work, but will not allow the weather to be changed.
